alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Norfolk, west central Plymouth and north central Bristol Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was reported over Sharon, or near Stoughton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Rainfall rates in excess of one inch per hour associated with nearly stationary storm. This storm has a history of producing frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Poor drainage flooding and minor ponding on roadways. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Taunton, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Mansfield, Easton, Norton, Sharon, Foxborough, East Bridgewater, Raynham and West Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
